text: 13.11: Kis 29.14; Wkp 6.30; 16.27; Nam 19.3Mba Zudaiŋ Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari guman pan, ana sɨgi vɨzi, ana nta ndia vov, Fhe Bakɨme Phenan Guigi Guarara Ŋgarigi Ruman verav, gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨzɨv zav ofa mbui. Mbe mba sɨgir ŋamtɨri, mbe mba ki ŋgu thav, kɨrar vhegap, nta mpooi.
